title: lakshhaNamulu
sahitya:
lakSaNamulu gala shrI rAmuniki pradakSiNa monarintumu rArE

anupallavi

kukSiNi brahmANDamu lunnavaTa vi-cakSuNuDaTa dIkSa guruDaTa shubha

caraNam

lakSmaNa lakSyamu gala shrutulaku pratyakSambaunaTa akSarasthulaina 
bhajana parulakE antaranguDaunaTa shiSabaDi sabhanu meppincu bhakta 
rakSakuDaunaTa sAkSiyai vElayu tyAgarAja pakSakuDaunaTa muppadi reNDu
